issue.title: [R] read_csv_arrow() Improvements
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18181](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18181). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Umbrella ticket for tickets relating to CSV reading via `read_csv_arrow()` improvements in R.

For improvements to reading CSV datasets, see ARROW-18352
